plot: The doctor finds Clara in present day, where they work together to solve the mystery of people disappearing which as it turns out, has a sinister link to WiFi.

A chance phone call reunites the Doctor with Clara in the present day. A mysterious organization, lead by the evil Miss Kizlet, sends robots known as "Spoonheads" to steal the minds of people who use the company's WiFi. The Doctor and Clara must work together to find the location of the organization and destroy it before the whole world is trapped by the WiFi.—Paul Briffett

The Doctor is living in 1207 in a monastery contemplating how he might get in touch with Clara when the telephone on the TARDIS rings. It's Clara, living in the present day, seeking assistance with her Internet connection. She has no memory of the Doctor and is again working as a nanny. The Doctor pays her a visit and soon concludes that a living sentient computer is stealing people's souls using wifi and the Internet. The unknown power controlling the wifi tries to convince the Doctor that he cannot win. When Clara is taken, the Doctor has every intention of getting her back.—garykmcd
